Package net.tp.utils

Class CharSequenceUtils

java.lang.Object
net.tp.utils.CharSequenceUtils
public abstract class CharSequenceUtils extends Object
Utility class for char sequences.
Since:
1.0.0

      public static CharSequence rightPad(CharSequence cs, int size, CharSequence padCs)
      Right pad of a char sequence.
      Parameters:
      cs - the char sequence to pad
      size - the size of the padding
      padCs - the padding char sequence
      Returns:
      the right padded char sequence
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • replace

      Replace all occurrences of a char in a char sequence.
      Parameters:
      cs - the char sequence to check
      searchChar - the char to search for
      replaceChar - the char to replace with
      Returns:
      the char sequence with the replaced char
      Since:
      1.0.0
